about_the_game:
Early Nexus Wars: Gameplay Foundation
Embark on start of Nexus Wars story, where players command mech armies in an auto-battler format. This stage sets the groundwork for gameplay mechanics, introducing 9 factions with 180 units and diverse skill sets, focusing on strategic PvP encounters, with a dynamic player driven story lines.

Start of Nexus Wars: Space Combat / Environment
Introducing strategic space combat and solar system territory control. It focuses on action-oriented ship control, offering a fresh perspective on space battles, ship customization, and progression.

End of Nexus Wars: World Building
Expands the universe with immersive lobbies for each faction, character creation, and customization. The stage integrates RPG and FPS elements, enhancing the game's depth and player engagement.

Calamity of Eternal Wars: Descend into Madness
Delve into the dark, mysterious forces threatening the galaxy. Challenging players to collaborate across factions to confront these sinister threats. A Soul Like game, in the place that should not exist, in a place of the impossible, in the presence of beyond - alien.

Nexus Wars is not just a game; it's an evolving universe, promising a blend of strategy, RPG/FPS, and space combat, set against a backdrop of intergalactic warfare and cosmic mysteries.

This live service game will explore the story telling in a uniquely retro way with communities engagement.

short_description: Embark on early Nexus Wars, an enthralling auto-battler set: 4970 years in the future, before the galactic calamity. Command a mech army across 9 factions with 180+ units: customizable gear and skills. Master strategic gameplay and PvP battles, laying the groundwork for an expansive PvE storyline.
